title._content: Saturday Street Auction on Main Street, Keene NH in 1890s

description._content: TITLE Saturday Street Auction on Main Street, Keene NH in 1890s CREATOR Howes, Van S., Keene NH SUBJECT Business districts - NH - Keene Stores and shops - NH - Keene Buildings - NH - Keene Carriages and coaches - NH - Keene Roads - NH - Keene Auctions - NH - Keene DESCRIPTION Photograph of the "Saturday Street Auction" on Main Street, Keene New Hampshire in 1893. "One of the features which served to advertise Keene were the Saturday street auctions, which were carried on for something like a hundred years. Nathan Pond began holding Saturday auctions at Mellen's Tavern, Jan.15, 1814, but after the tavern burned, sales were removed to the street, and were held southerly of the park, under the "Auction tree", and lastly in the location shown." PUBLISHER Keene Public Library DATE DIGITAL 20080310 DATE ORIGINAL 1893 RESOURCE TYPE photographs FORMAT image/jpg RESOURCE IDENTIFIER hsykmst027 RIGHTS MANAGMENT No known restriction on publication.
